it.polimi.se2018.view.app

Class App

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se2018.view.app.App
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ControllerActionsInterface, ControllerToolCardActionsInterface
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CLIApp, ClientControllerTest.AppMock, JavaFXApp, ServerMessageHandlerImplTest.AppMock

    public abstract class App
extends java.lang.Object
implements ControllerActionsInterface, ControllerToolCardActionsInterface
    Abstract Class App represents the generic user interface (CLI or JavaFX)
    Author:
    Mathyas Giudici
